rooms.name: Entrance Hallway & Living Room
rooms.description: Dual-purpose space serving as both the entrance corridor and a modern living area with minimalistic furniture, ample natural lighting through large windows.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for functional meals with built-in storage and an open layout.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact yet efficient kitchen space integrating modern appliances in a cost-effective manner.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Small, functional guest bathroom located near the entrance for visitors.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed to face the east for Vastu compliance and morning sunlight.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Second bedroom optimized for space on a split-level design, offering a private balcony facing south.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Third bedroom with sufficient storage and natural lighting from windows oriented towards the east.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom for master bedroom featuring cost-effective yet modern fixtures.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space with built-in bookshelves, comfortable seating area, and access to the garden via a sliding glass door. Designed as an extension of the living space on a split-level for privacy.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: A compact study area integrated with modern technology for work or school, with natural lighting and views towards the garden.
